title: Kondo no Koi wa Kachimashou
original_name: 今度の恋は勝ちましょう
sinopse:
Every day I go to work without conviction, without having fun and I get caught up in an uninteresting routine. Moreover, I'm single and have no hobby, so my life is not very bright. But then I meet the handsome boss Kurose, and everything changes. He begins to lighten up my life.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
